# YAML Frontmatter Test Document

This document contains YAML frontmatter at the top, which should be parsed correctly by the Markdown linter.

## Content Section

The frontmatter above includes various data types:
- String values
- Boolean values
- Array values
- Nested object values

## Usage

This pattern is commonly used in:
- Static site generators (Jekyll, Hugo, Eleventy)
- Documentation systems
- Blog platforms
- Content management systems
